page.title: 11Farming in Newborough.
page.content: The land around Newborough is very flat and fertile.The soil is heavy clay and black fen.The machinery can easily work the soil.At the sides of the fields there are dykes for drainage. We interviewed Farmer Harris.He told us that crops use nutrients and these are replaced by fertilizer which the farmer sprays on.The farmer said his main problem was to stop fungus grasses and weeds growing in with the crop.He stops these from taking all the nutrients by using chemicals to destroy them.
